mapper.select: SELECT YEAR(a.join_date) AS join_year FROM hpa100t a GROUP BY join_year ORDER BY join_year DESC
SELECT SUBSTR(a.join_date, 5, 2) AS join_month FROM hpa100t a GROUP BY join_month ORDER BY join_month ASC
SELECT a.detail_code, a.detail_code_name FROM bco100t a WHERE a.com_code = 'H068' AND a.detail_code IN ('1', '3')

SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, a.pern_no, A.NAME, b.DETAIL_CODE AS dept_code, a.dept_name, a.post_code, c.detail_code_name AS post_name, a.repre_num, a.pay_grade, d.detail_code_name AS pay_name, a.work_area, f.detail_code_name AS work_area_name, a.join_date, YEAR(a.join_date) AS join_year, MONTH(a.join_date) AS join_month, a.retr_date, YEAR(a.retr_date) AS retr_year, MONTH(a.retr_date) AS retr_month, a.kor_addr, a.salary_code, e.detail_code_name AS salary_name, a.wages_amt, CASE WHEN IFNULL(A.PAY_GRADE2, '') = '' THEN '' ELSE A.PAY_GRADE2 + '호봉' END AS payGrade2 FROM hpa100t a, (SELECT DETAIL_CODE, detail_code_name FROM bco100t WHERE com_code = 'H002' ) b, (SELECT DETAIL_CODE, detail_code_name FROM bco100t WHERE com_code = 'H005' ) c, (SELECT DETAIL_CODE, detail_code_name FROM bco100t WHERE com_code = 'H004' ) d, (SELECT DETAIL_CODE, detail_code_name FROM bco100t WHERE com_code = 'H028' ) e, (SELECT DETAIL_CODE, detail_code_name FROM bco100t WHERE com_code = 'H003' ) f WHERE a.dept_code = b.DETAIL_CODE (+) AND a.post_code = c.DETAIL_CODE (+) AND a.pay_grade = d.DETAIL_CODE (+) AND a.salary_code = e.DETAIL_CODE (+) AND a.work_area = f.detail_code (+)
AND a.join_date is NOT NULL AND a.retr_date is NULL
AND a.retr_date is NOT NULL
AND ((SUBSTR(a.join_date, 0, 4) = #{joinYear}) OR (SUBSTR(a.retr_date, 0, 4) = #{joinYear}))
AND ((SUBSTR(a.join_date, 5, 2) = #{joinMonth}) OR (SUBSTR(a.retr_date, 5, 2) = #{joinMonth}))
ORDER BY rnum
